resources: // net Sync to cloud Exit * If you have a LoRa gateway, please config the gateway connect to MOKO LoRa server, the server address is 101.37.81.143, the port is 1700, the current supported channel are AS923, AU915_CH00-07, AU915_CH08-15, EU868, US915_CH00-07, US915_CH08-15,select the correct channel please.
